header.name: Fattesingh Rane

As experienced developer I would like to work with an organization which helps me gaining more knowlegde helping my and organizational growth

projects.title: Resume Builder Cli
project_description: Simple project to run in gitlab workflow and generate resume as part of artifacts
input to the project is supplied through a json file which has all required details of candidate
when a new changes are merged in main branch workflow begins and outputs resume as artifacts
supports adding new json files as input and also user can pass a word template to customize resume as per user convinience
projects.motivation: Motivation to do this project was to avoid updating resume manually which costs alot of time ensuring styles, template etc. This project aims to minimize the amount of time needed to setup new resume or update existing resume.

projects.title: Restaurant Listing API
projects.motivation: Project developed in order to support small shopkeer to list their shop items online with minimal cost helping them increasing sales and revenue
my_role: I was responsible for development and maintainance of Web API
API was developed to using Go with create, retrive, update features

projects.title: Online Product Review Classification
project_description: Project consist of total four algorithms namely Porter Stemmer, Naive Baysian, K Nearest and Feature Extraction
We used porter stemmer to remove steming words from data set
Used naive baysian and k nearest neighbor algorithm to identify whether product query is good or bad
Come up with feature extraction algorithm to translate product review and compute a new system generated rating for product
Published Feature extraction technique in IEE research paper
projects.motivation: Motivation was to understand machine learning and data mining and come up with a new way to provide rating to online product helping users to compare product
